com.facebook.buck.rules

Class BuildRuleResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.BuildRuleResolver

  • public class BuildRuleResolver
extends Object
    Provides a mechanism for mapping between a BuildTarget and the BuildRule it represents. Once parsing is complete, instances of this class can be considered immutable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BuildRuleResolver() 
      BuildRuleResolver(Map<BuildTarget,BuildRule> buildRuleIndex) 
      BuildRuleResolver(Set<? extends BuildRule> startingSet)

      Adds to the index a mapping from target to buildRule.
      <T extends BuildRule> 
      T      		 addToIndex(T buildRule)
      Adds to the index a mapping from buildRule's target to itself and returns buildRule.

      Returns the BuildRule with the fullyQualifiedName.
